name: Agents of Aggro City Online
description: Agents of Aggro City Online is a community based online game and adventure. Help your city get rid of the aggro levels and build your agency by defeating aggromites and researching new ways of keeping city aggro levels at minimum levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista 7/8/10 Processor: Pentium 4 or 1.80 GHz equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Core 2 Duo 1.8 GHz or higher Memory: 1 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
